english_measurements.address: 1st Floor, Belapur Bhavan, C.B.D., Navi Mumbai - 400 614
english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-7, New Link Road, Malad (W)
english_measurements.subject: Regarding payment of road excavation charges.
english_measurements.reference_2: Estimate submitted by the Executive Engineer, Turbhe on 23/9/25.
english_measurements.body_summary: This is to inform that M/s. Bharti Airtel Limited has proposed excavation by open trench method for a total of 812 m. from South Central Road (near HP Petrol pump) to Manish Export in Nerul division. In this regard, the Hon. Executive Engineer has submitted the estimate for the excavation of the asphalt road. As per the government resolution and the estimate provided by the Executive Engineer, the charges have been shown. You are requested to deposit the following amount for the excavation work in the Municipal Corporation.
english_measurements.amount_in_words: Rupees One Crore Fifty-Eight Lakh Thirty-One Thousand Two Hundred Forty-One only
english_measurements.payment_instructions: As per the above, a demand draft (D.D.) for the total amount of Rs. 1,58,31,241/- should be prepared and deposited in the accounts department of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation. A photocopy of the said receipt should be submitted to this office. Only after that, permission for road excavation will be considered, and an agreement will be processed. The responsibility of paying GST as per Notification No. 03/2018 Central Tax (Rate) dated 25 January 2018 will be of your organization. Please take note of this.
english_measurements.surface: New Asphalt Surface / Cable through duct / Number of ducts 3 / New Asphalt Surface (Open Trench Method) / Total Sq.M.
